mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM AREABOARD

select X.RNUM,X.AREABOARD_NUM, X.USER_NICKNAME,X.AREABOARD_CODE, X.AREABOARD_TITLE, X.AREABOARD_TIME,X.AREABOARD_CONTENT,X.AREABOARD_VIEW,X.AREABOARD_LIKE,X.AREABOARD_HATE,X.AREABOARD_CATEGORY,X.AREABOARD_COMMENTCOUNT from (select rownum as rnum, A.AREABOARD_NUM, A.USER_NICKNAME,AREABOARD_CODE,A.AREABOARD_TITLE, A.AREABOARD_TIME,A.AREABOARD_CONTENT,A.AREABOARD_VIEW,A.AREABOARD_LIKE,A.AREABOARD_HATE,A.AREABOARD_CATEGORY,A.AREABOARD_COMMENTCOUNT FROM ( select AREABOARD_NUM, USER_NICKNAME,AREABOARD_CODE,AREABOARD_TITLE, AREABOARD_TIME,AREABOARD_CONTENT,AREABOARD_VIEW,AREABOARD_LIKE,AREABOARD_HATE,AREABOARD_CATEGORY,AREABOARD_COMMENTCOUNT from AREABOARD order by AREABOARD_NUM DESC) A where ROWNUM <= #{endNum} AND AREABOARD_CODE = #{areaboard_code}) X where X.rnum >= #{startNum}

select X.RNUM,X.AREABOARD_NUM, X.USER_NICKNAME,X.AREABOARD_CODE, X.AREABOARD_TITLE, X.AREABOARD_TIME,X.AREABOARD_CONTENT,X.AREABOARD_VIEW,X.AREABOARD_LIKE,X.AREABOARD_HATE,X.AREABOARD_CATEGORY,X.AREABOARD_COMMENTCOUNT from (select rownum as rnum, A.AREABOARD_NUM, A.USER_NICKNAME,AREABOARD_CODE,A.AREABOARD_TITLE, A.AREABOARD_TIME,A.AREABOARD_CONTENT,A.AREABOARD_VIEW,A.AREABOARD_LIKE,A.AREABOARD_HATE,A.AREABOARD_CATEGORY,A.AREABOARD_COMMENTCOUNT FROM ( select AREABOARD_NUM, USER_NICKNAME,AREABOARD_CODE,AREABOARD_TITLE, AREABOARD_TIME,AREABOARD_CONTENT,AREABOARD_VIEW,AREABOARD_LIKE,AREABOARD_HATE,AREABOARD_CATEGORY,AREABOARD_COMMENTCOUNT from AREABOARD order by AREABOARD_NUM DESC) A where ROWNUM <= #{endNum} AND AREABOARD_CODE = #{areaboard_code} AND ${keyField} LIKE '%${keyWord}%') X where X.rnum >= #{startNum}
